title: SliderX
shortDescription: Ultra-lightweight, modern & fully customisable slideshow app
longDescription: **SliderX** is an ultra-lightweight and modern slideshow app for your site. It supports **images**, **video** and **text**. It has been crafted with great ‚ù§Ô∏è and you get a *plethora* of options to customise it to your like. If you find it useful please leave a review and thumbs up üëç üôè *If you have any issue or an idea for a nice feature, please get in touch.* üöÄ
author: Francesco Natali

products.title: Pro
products.shortDescription: Complete control, full power and all options. Create a stunning slideshow. üöÄ ‚≠êÔ∏è

positionsliderbottom.description: Change this value for fine-grained positioning (bottom).
positionsliderbottom.title: Position Slider (bottom)

positionsliderleft.description: Change this value for fine-grained positioning (left).
positionsliderleft.title: Position Slider (left)

positionsliderright.description: Change this value for fine-grained positioning (right).
positionsliderright.title: Position Slider (right)

positionslidertop.description: Change this value for fine-grained positioning (top).
positionslidertop.title: Position Slider (top)

borderHigh.description: Increase or decrease the thickness of the border.
borderHigh.title: High (pixels)

bordertoggle.description: Enable/Disable a border, change thickness and color.
bordertoggle.title: Show Border Options

enabledisable.description: You can easily enable and disable SliderX here.
enabledisable.title: Enable/Disable

endMessage.helpvalue:
Thank you for using SliderX! üôè
For any question or suggestion, please get in touch.

Other great apps from the same author:
  • Toast: the best and most advanced Notification Bar
  • Scroll Progress: a beautiful Scroll Progress indicator
  • Shareit: modern and lightweight Sharing Widget
  • Liquid Button: professional Call-To-Action button

introMessage.helpvalue:
Hi there! üëã SliderX is an ultra-lightweight, modern and fully customisable slideshow app for your site.

It has been crafted with great ‚ù§Ô∏è If you find it useful please leave a review and thumbs up üëç üôè

If you have any issue or an idea for a nice feature, please get in touch.

SliderX version 1.0

locationtoggle.description: üìç Where should it appear on your site?
locationtoggle.title: Show Location Options

sizeoptionstoggle.description: You can set fixed size (pixels) or relative (%).
sizeoptionstoggle.title: Show Size Options

enumNames.contain: It fits entirly within its slide
enumNames.cover: It covers the entire slide (It might be clipped to fit)

imagefit.title: How this image should fit its container?

text.description: Support rich text, links, images and emoji.
text.title: Message

video.description:
From any video platform: YouTube, Vimeo, etc.
Please note: use the URL generated when you share the video, instead of the URL of the webpage where the video can be seen. (e.g. https://player.vimeo.com/video/123, instead of https://vimeo.com/123).
video.title: Video URL

slidestoggle.description: üåÑ Add images, text, video to your SliderX.
slidestoggle.title: Show Slides Options

opacity.description: Make SliderX more or less transparent.
opacity.title: Opacity

shadow.description: Enable/disable a nice shadow to add an elegant depth.
shadow.title: Shadow

themeColor.description: It affects arrows and navigation dots.
themeColor.title: Theme Color

themetoggle.description: üåà Change color, opacity, shadow, navigation dots and arrows.
themetoggle.title: Show Theme Options

timerSeconds.title: Number of seconds between each slide.

timertoggle.description: ‚è∞ Enable / Disable automatic change of slide.
timertoggle.title: Show Timer Options
